age_range.evidence: Participant mentions working as a manager role, waking up at 7:30am, and talking about a new role.

gender.evidence: Participant’s language, discussion of a team, and references to ‘managing’ suggest a male perspective.

nationality_background.evidence: Seattle is a location in the USA.

location.evidence: Participant explicitly states 'I live in Seattle'.

living_situation.evidence: Participant states 'I just live by myself' and ‘rented an apartment’.

occupation.evidence: Participant states 'I work for [ORG_MASKED]. So basically do some AI models to improve his shopping business' and later describes taking on a 'manager role'.

education.evidence: Participant discusses 'roadmap review and planning of the project' and 'technical reports and paper' indicating a level of technical understanding.

goals_and_motivations.value: Improving business performance through AI, professional growth, personal development (gym)
goals_and_motivations.evidence: Participant’s work involves ‘improving his shopping business’ and ‘communicate with different customers to align with their expectations’ along with his frequent gym attendance.

interests.evidence: Participant’s work focuses on AI models, mentions reading technical reports, engages in shopping behavior, and goes to the gym.

values.evidence: Participant’s actions like planning roadmaps, communicating with customers, and working with a new role align with valuing efficiency, quality, and customer satisfaction. Also mentioning innovation.

frequency_of_use.evidence: Participant buys items like slippers and a body trimmer, suggesting a regular purchasing pattern.

where_used_devices.evidence: Participant uses the Amazon app and mentions searching on Chat GPT, indicating smartphone usage. Likely uses a tablet too.

search_style_best_vs_first.evidence: Participant states he ‘chooses one with the quickest delivery, and the the highest number of purchases’ when buying items on Amazon.

price_preference_cheapest_vs_expensive.evidence: Participant selects products based on delivery speed and popularity, implying a preference for affordable options.

decision_factors.evidence: Participant mentions considering these factors when purchasing items.

preferred_categories.evidence: Participant buys a body trimmer, a calculator, and slippers, all falling within these categories.

pain_points_and_or_challenges.value: Time constraints for research, managing team expectations, resource allocation
pain_points_and_or_challenges.evidence: Participant’s discussion about ‘defining the resources and define my team’, ‘back and forth’ communication, and ‘managing expectations’ indicate these pain points.
